```{r ggMSArITS, out.extra="angle=90", fig.cap=caption$msa_rITS}

  knitr_title = "Nuclear rITS",
  knitr_type = "section", chunk_type = knit_variables$pandoc
)

caption$msa_rITS <-
  "Mulitple sequence alignment of unique Nuclear rITS sites."

knitr::include_graphics(
  path = system.file(
    fs::path("figures/AppendixMSArITS", ext = knit_variables$graphics),
    package = "Thesis"
  )
)
```

# R SESSION INFO {-}

```{r sessionInfo}

pkg_session <-
  devtools::session_info(pkgs = "ThesisPackage")[2] %>%
  plyr::ldply(.data = .) %>%
  dplyr::select(package, ondiskversion, date, source) %>%
  setNames(object = ., nm = c("Package", "Version", "Date", "Source"))

if (knit_variables$pandoc == "latex") {
  knitr::kable(
    x = pkg_session, format = knit_variables$kable_format,
    longtable = TRUE, escape = TRUE,
    caption = "\\texttt{ThesisPackage} R session info."
  ) %>%
    kableExtra::column_spec(column = 1, border_left = TRUE) %>%
    kableExtra::column_spec(column = 4, border_right = TRUE) %>%
    kableExtra::kable_styling(
      latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header"),
      repeat_header_text = "Continued.",
      repeat_header_method = "replace",
      font_size = 8
    )
}

```
